duck: A regimen is a plan, a regulated course such as a diet, exercise or medical treatment, designed to give a positive result.
regimen definition: a systematic plan (as of diet, therapy, or medication) especially when designed to improve and maintain the health of a patient.

wiki.text:
A 'regimen' is a plan, a regulated course such as a diet, exercise or medical
treatment, designed to give a positive result.<ref>[http://www.merriam-
webster.com/dictionary/regimen "Regimen."] Merriam-Webster Online Dictionary.
2010.</ref><ref>Alderman, Lesley. "Aftercare tips for patients checking out of
the hospital." New York Times 19 June 2010: B6(L).</ref> A low-salt diet is a
regimen. A course of penicillin is a regimen.
wiki.title: regimen
